org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest

Class SecureServerPermission

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.Permission
      • net.jini.security.AccessPermission
        • org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest.SecureServerPermission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Guard, Constants

    public class SecureServerPermission
extends net.jini.security.AccessPermission
implements Constants
    A permission used to express the access control policy for the SecureServer class. The name specifies the names of the method which you have permission to call. An asterisk means all methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
